alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 20 at 3:12PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory remains in effect... * Active thunderstorms associated with a tropical low just southwest of American Samoa will bring strong and gusty northwesterly winds across the islands. Expect higher and gusty winds downslope mountains and the Pago Pago Harbor region... * TIMING...through Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. Downed shallow-root trees and phone lines are possible. Shifting of loose and unsecured objects are also possible. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 312 AOAULI ASO TOFI IANUARI 20 2022 ...O loo faaauau le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O loo gasolo mai i luga o le atunu`u faititili ma timuga mamafa o loo lata i se taaviliga o savili i saute i sisifo o le atusamoa. O nei faititili e ono mafua ai ona agi malosi ma faata`uta`u savili. E maualuluga savili ma agi fa`ata`uta`u i nofoaga maualalo ma tu lata i mauga ae maise lava le uafu i Pago Pago... * TAIMI...e oo i le Aso Faraile. * NOFOAGA AAFIA..E pau`u laau, lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. . FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA...
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
